title: Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Fleece Cargo Pants
description: Two side pockets, two rear pockets, and two cargo pockets provide ultimate utility with ample storage, velco flaps keep your valuables secure
Elastic waistband with drawstring provide a great fit
Heavyweight 13 oz fleece fabric perfect for keeping you warm and comfortable
Pro Club quality, famous for its premium thick fleece and relaxed fit for superior warmth and comfort
